Player History
Had first career hit on 4/3/1985, off Dan Quisenberry (KC)...
Injured on 4/18/1985 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Hit first career homerun on 4/27/1985, off Marty Bystrom (NYY)...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Kansas City on 8/27/1986...
8/17/1987: Signed a contract extension with Oakland, $3,120,000 per year, for 2 years.
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against New York (Y) on 4/17/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/31/1988, hitting .478 with 2 HR, 4 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 1988...
Injured on 7/20/1989 with a Broken Knee, out for full season...
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 3/3/1990 to a 1-year deal worth $3,900,000 per year...
Injured on 4/4/1990 with a Strained Medial Collateral Ligament, out for 3 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 4/3/1991 to a 1-year deal worth $620,000 per year...
